name: checkthatphone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool checkthatphone.
Tool description: Real-time phone validation and data lookup for U.S. numbers. 
All-in-one: carrier look-up, line type, portability status, geoIP, timezone, and routing.
API description: Validates a given United States phone number and optionally checks its details like carrier look-up, line type, portability status, geoIP, and timezone using an external API service.

phone.description: The United States phone number to validate.

ip.description: The IP address to associate with the request. Defaults to '172.95.90.55'.
